description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Golden Treasury of Art and Song. Illustrated by R. A. Bell. Edited and arranged by R. E. M" Author: MACK, Robert Ellice. Contributor: BELL, Robert Anning. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11651.m.22." Page: 47 Place of Publishing: London; Nuremberg [printed Date of Publishing: 1890 Publisher: E. Nister Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002319551 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Please note that you will need to enter details from the above list - such as the shelfmark, the page, the book's volume and so on - when filling out your order. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue. You will be able to download a PDF of the book this image is taken from, as well as view the pages up close with the 'itemViewer'.
